table.caption: Table 146 – Additional entry in a soft-mask image dictionary
head: Key
Type
Value
rows: (Optional; PDF 1.4) An array of component values specifying the matte colour with which the image data in the parent image has been preblended. The array shall consist of n numbers, where n is the number of components in the colour space specified by the ColorSpace entry in the parent image’s image dictionary; the numbers is valid colour components in that colour space. If this entry is absent, the image data is not preblended.
